# Peter Lynch Fair Value

The Peter Lynch Fair Value is a valuation method developed by renowned investor Peter Lynch. This method is used to estimate the fair value of a company based on its earnings growth rate. According to Lynch, a fairly priced stock has a price/earnings (P/E) ratio that is equal to its growth rate.

The formula for the Peter Lynch Fair Value is:

- Fair Value = Earnings * (Expected Growth Rate)
